example.parse: (S-HLN (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN_PROP نيودلهي)) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تشترط) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN سحب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحشود)))) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC ترجمة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ-2 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أقوال) (NP (NOUN_PROP مشرّف))) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC أفعالاً)))))))

arg.g: in order to withdraw the troops
